raw_text:
When AP is engaged, pilots are allowed to manually change the airplane state by using the Touch Control Steering (TCS) function, without disengaging the AP. If the Go-Around vertical mode is the active mode, TCS function will not be available. The Flight Guidance applications will synchronize the mode references to the current values while TCS is active for the following list of modes:

TCS Activation Modes

Active Mode Reference

ROL Roll Angle

ROL Heading

FLCH Airspeed

ALT Altitude

FPA Flight Path Angle

VS Vertical Speed

The respective reference bugs on the PFD are also synchronized for the following modes according to the table below:

5th Edition 8-20 02 APR 19
